title: Allamanda cathartica (Linn.) leaf extract-encapsulated phytoemulsions: formulation, characterization and in vitro–in vivo biological evaluations
content:
Sustainable Food Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4FB00077C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ritu Tomar, Sabya Sachi Das, Vivek Sahu, Neha Kapoor, Divya Chaudhary, Jagannath Sahoo, Santosh Kumar Rath, Kavindra Kumar Kesari
The work highlights that Allamanda cathartica (Linn.) leaf extract-encapsulated phytoemulsions exhibited potential antioxidant, anticancer and antibacterial effects with improved solubility, permeability, stability, and biosafety.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
